name: Call of the Ninja!
description: Call of the Ninja is a Puzzle Platform game in the visual style of lemmings!Manage a whole heap of ninjas as they flip, dash, climb and vanish their way to the Dojo!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or Later Processor: Intel Core 2 / Athlon64 or later Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Shader Model 2 Capable DirectX: Version 9.0c Sound Card: Any Stereo Card
